page.title: 12 SHOPPING IN ROGERSTONE
page.content: In four areas there are som groups of small shops.These shops do not supply everything that the housewives need so many make a trip to Newport every week. About 15 years ago an Asda Superstore was built and it changed the area's shopping habits.The facilities of Asda include a free bus service of up to ten buses a day and petrol at reasonable prices.The large car park has accommodation for 650 cars. The staff in the store are very helpful.There are 103 full-time staff and 211 part-time. There is an unloading bay where 250 lorries deliver goods each week. Asda sells food but clothes, electrical goods and small tools are also available at low prices.
